item.title: Killing Scalia: The Clinton Crime Family
Where's the Outrage Over Democrat Death Party?
item.description: Let’s play a game, shall we? How would CNN report the following tweets: These are real tweets from real people with one word changed. I replaced “Trump” in the original tweets with “Hillary.” You can see these death-happy tweets and many, many more on Breitbart.com. Real people openly call for assassination as if they were rooting for a basketball team. Scary, isn’t it? You didn’t miss the media outrage over these tweet–it didn’t happen.
